lead_paragraph: Anze Kopitar and Tanner Pearson scored less than 3 minutes apart early in the first period and Dwight King scored on a breakaway in the third, leading the Los Angeles Kings to a 3-2 victory over the Montreal Canadiens on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Kopitar, Pearson Lead Kings Past Canadiens 3-2
headline.main: Kopitar, Pearson Lead Kings Past Canadiens 3-2
